content: Hi folks! We are starting a series of live community events, and would love for you to join us. The events will be designed to provide an opportunity to connect informally with the Zulip core team and other community members. Ideas for events you'd be excited to see in the future are much appreciated!

Event: User community chat

Topic: Zulip onboarding workshop

Have you helped others in your organization get started with Zulip? Or perhaps you’ve recently started using Zulip yourself? We are working on improving Zulip’s onboarding experience, and would love to hear about your pain points, and get your ideas for what would make it easier next time someone joins your Zulip organization. This will also be a chance to ask questions and get advice about best onboarding practices from other Zulip users.

Time: 2024-02-21T09:00:00-08:00 to 2024-02-21T09:45:00-08:00

Place: : Chat event in #user questions > onboarding experience, in the Zulip development community
